#Text= Korra says : " Uncle , why did you bring your troops down from the North ?

column1: #Text=" Unalaq says : " Now that you 've opened the Southern portal , we need to protect it from the people who would do the spirits harm .
#Text=" Korra says : " I can protect it .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I need you for something more important .
#Text=There is another portal , in the North .
#Text=Once you open it , spirits and man will be able to move freely between the North and the South in a matter of seconds .
#Text=" Korra says : " But , the solstice is over .
#Text=How am I going to open it ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " The spiritual energy is much stronger in the North .
#Text=And now that you 've opened the Southern portal , your energy is stronger as well .
#Text=" Korra says : " With both portals open , our tribes will be united again .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " The world will be united again .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Ahh , I have n't felt this at peace since - Aaand , it 's over .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Gooood morning , Universe .
#Text=" Kya says : " Bumi , please , cover yourself .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Well , lookee here , " Vacation Tenzin " has finally decided to join us .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Yes , he has .
#Text=It 's so nice to get to spend more time with my family .
#Text=Is n't that right , my little Rohan ?
#Text=And I 've really enjoyed having you two around .
#Text=Reminds me of all those great vacations we took as kids with Dad .
#Text=" Kya says : " Uhh , I think your memory 's a little foggy .
#Text=Bumi and I were n't on those great vacations .
#Text=It was always just you and Dad .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No , that ca n't be right .
#Text=What about the time he took us to Kyoshi Island to ride the elephant koi ?
#Text=" Kya says : " Nope , we were n't there .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Hmm .
#Text=Oh , remember Ember Island ?
#Text=Those amazing sand palaces we built on the beach .
#Text=" Bumi says : " You mean , you built ?
#Text=We never saw the place .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I could 've sworn .
#Text="
